kama ralle chithrapata thanima ada lokaye maha parimanayen siduwennak.amarikawa pramukha batahira ratawala me akaraye chithrapata thanima siduwanne dawantha wyapara mattamin.mita tika kalekata issara me asabhya nirmana batahira lokayata sima wela thibunath ada aasiyanu ratawalata mewa thawaduratath aaganthuka dewal wanne na.me aakarayen lokaya purawatama nil chithrapata thanima maha parimanayen siduwanne eewata thibena adhika illuma nisaweni.boho dena thalu mara mara me chithrapatayan rasawidi muth ehi thirayen pitupasapa kathawa nam penena tharam sundara wanne na.niyud‚Ä¶.ee pilibanda hungak de obata kiya dewi.

palawaththa baththaramulla hi pihiti janatha wimukthi peramune pradhana karyalaye me wanawitath pawathwena madhya hamuwa amathamin jawipe pracharaka lekam wijitha herath mahatha wisin me bawa sandahan kale ya. 1979di gena ena lada panathe waganthi kihipayak iwath kara ema waganthiwalatath wada barapathala waganthi rasakma mema nawa ketumpathata athulath kara athi bawath meya thrasthawadaya dadamimakaragena rajya thrasthawadaya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha gena enu labana panathak bawath mema panatha kriyathmaka wuwahoth aduma tharame wruththiya samithi kriyamargawalata elambaimata athi ayithiwasikama pawa ahosi wi yana bawath ehidi wijitha herath mahatha awadharanaya kale ya.
